description: Worked on a project that involved developing one of the first Restaurant Reservation Platform in Bangladesh. I was responsible for developing the front-end of the platform using React.js & Next.js and integrating it with the back-end API.
Worked on a project that involved developing a B2B platform for the company. I was responsible for developing the front-end of the platform using React.js and integrating it with the back-end API.

Worked on a project that involved developing a IoT based system for monitoring and controlling the temperature, humidity, door status of a medicine storage device for company client. The project was developed using Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, React.js, Socket.io and MQTT protocol.
